testcase.failure:
Resource: module.ec2_monolith.aws_lb.main File: /tf/modules/ec2-monolith/main.tf: 40-63 Guideline: https://docs.prismacloud.io/en/enterprise-edition/policy-reference/aws-policies/aws-general-policies/bc-aws-150
40 | resource "aws_lb" "main" { 41 | name_prefix = substr(replace(var.project_name, "-", ""), 0, 6) 42 | internal = false 43 | load_balancer_type = "application" 44 | security_groups = [var.alb_security_group_id] 45 | subnets = var.public_subnets 46 | 47 | enable_deletion_protection = { 48 | default = false # dev 49 | prod = true # Establecer en tfvars para prod 50 | } 51 | 52 | tags = { 53 | Name = "${var.project_name}-${var.environment}-alb" 54 | } 55 | 56 | access_logs { 57 | bucket = aws_s3_bucket.alb_logs.id 58 | prefix = "alb-logs" 59 | enabled = true 60 | } 61 | 62 | drop_invalid_header_fields = true 63 | }

testcase.name: [NONE][CKV2_AWS_69] Ensure AWS RDS database instance configured with encryption in transit

failure.message: Ensure AWS RDS database instance configured with encryption in transit

testcase.failure:
Resource: module.rds.aws_db_instance.main File: /tf/modules/rds/main.tf: 13-60 Guideline: https://docs.prismacloud.io/en/enterprise-edition/policy-reference/aws-policies/aws-networking-policies/bc-aws-2-69
13 | resource "aws_db_instance" "main" { 14 | identifier = "${var.project_name}-${var.environment}-db" 15 | engine = "postgres" 16 | engine_version = "15.4" 17 | instance_class = var.db_instance_class 18 | allocated_storage = 20 19 | storage_type = "gp3" 20 | storage_encrypted = true 21 | 22 | deletion_protection = var.environment == "prod" ? true : false 23 | iam_database_authentication_enabled = true 24 | auto_minor_version_upgrade = true 25 | copy_tags_to_snapshot = true 26 | 27 | db_name = var.db_name 28 | username = var.db_username 29 | password = var.db_password 30 | 31 | # Performance Insights 32 | performance_insights_enabled = true 33 | performance_insights_retention_period = 7 34 | performance_insights_kms_key_id = aws_kms_key.rds.arn 35 | 36 | db_parameter_group_name = aws_db_parameter_group.main.name 37 | 38 | db_subnet_group_name = aws_db_subnet_group.main.name 39 | vpc_security_group_ids = [var.rds_security_group] 40 | 41 | # Multi-AZ para alta disponibilidad 42 | multi_az = true 43 | 44 | # Backups automticos 45 | backup_retention_period = 7 46 | backup_window = "03:00-04:00" 47 | maintenance_window = "mon:04:00-mon:05:00" 48 | 49 | # Performance y logs 50 | enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports = ["postgresql"] 51 | monitoring_interval = 60 52 | monitoring_role_arn = aws_iam_role.rds_monitoring.arn 53 | 54 | skip_final_snapshot = false 55 | final_snapshot_identifier = "${var.project_name}-${var.environment}-final-snapshot-${formatdate("YYYY-MM-DD-hhmm", timestamp())}" 56 | 57 | tags = { 58 | Name = "${var.project_name}-${var.environment}-rds" 59 | } 60 | }
